sampleFiles.content:
<div class="grid__wrapper">
    <igx-grid [rowSelectable]="false" #grid height="480px" [data]="data" displayDensity="compact" [allowFiltering]="true" width="100%">
        <igx-column [movable]="true" [resizable]="true" field="ID" [filterable]="false" width="136px"></igx-column>
        <igx-column-group [movable]="true" [pinned]="false" header="General Information">
            <igx-column [movable]="true" sortable="true" resizable="true" field="CompanyName" width="136px"></igx-column>
            <igx-column-group [movable]="true" header="Person Details">
                <igx-column [movable]="true" [pinned]="false" sortable="true" resizable="true" field="ContactName" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column [movable]="true" sortable="true" resizable="true" field="ContactTitle" width="136px"></igx-column>
            </igx-column-group>
        </igx-column-group>
        <igx-column-group header="Address Information">
            <igx-column-group header="Location">
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Country" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Region" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="City" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Address" width="136px"></igx-column>
            </igx-column-group>
            <igx-column-group header="Contact Information">
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Phone" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Fax" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="PostalCode" width="136px"></igx-column>
            </igx-column-group>
        </igx-column-group>
        <igx-column-group header="Address Information">
            <igx-column-group header="Location">
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Country" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Region" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="City" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Address" width="136px"></igx-column>
            </igx-column-group>
            <igx-column-group header="Contact Information">
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Phone" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Fax" width="136px"></igx-column>
                <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="PostalCode" width="136px"></igx-column>
            </igx-column-group>
        </igx-column-group>
        <igx-column-group header="Contact Information">
            <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Phone" width="136px"></igx-column>
            <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="Fax" width="136px"></igx-column>
            <igx-column sortable="true" resizable="true" field="PostalCode" width="136px"></igx-column>
        </igx-column-group>
    </igx-grid>

    <section class="button-section">
        <button igxButton="raised" (click)="pinGroup()">Pin first group</button>
        <button igxButton="raised" (click)="hideGroup()">Hide first group</button>
    </section>

export const data = [
